examples.translation: 经长时间的辩论，议案获得通过。
你们会给我开这个的账单吗？
他们无力支付这些账单。
examples.first: They couldn't afford to pay the

v: advertise especially by posters or placards

a piece of paper money (especially one issued by a central bank)
